languages.text: "Как странно слышать от ксеноса рассуждения о скверне. Вы сами — нечистые творения, и все же опасаетесь того же, с чем ведем непримиримую войну мы".
"How strange to hear a xenos speak of corruption. We wage an implacable war against this foulness, and you, a tainted creature, fear it too."
languages.original_text: "Как странно слышать от ксеноса рассуждения о скверне. Вы сами — нечистые творения, и все же опасаетесь того же, с чем ведем непримиримую войну мы".

traits.locale_text: "How strange to hear a xenos speak of corruption. We wage an implacable war against this foulness, and you, a tainted creature, fear it too."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How strange to hear a xenos speak of corruption. We wage an implacable war against this foulness, and you, a tainted creature, fear it too."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How strange to hear a xenos speak of corruption. We wage an implacable war against this foulness, and you, a tainted creature, fear it too."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “听异形讨论腐化，这种感觉真是古怪。我们发起了一场永无休止的战争，就是为了对抗这种污秽之物。而你，身为被玷污的生物，居然也会惧怕腐化。”
languages.original_text: "How strange to hear a xenos speak of corruption. We wage an implacable war against this foulness, and you, a tainted creature, fear it too."

traits.locale_text: “听异形讨论腐化，这种感觉真是古怪。我们发起了一场永无休止的战争，就是为了对抗这种污秽之物。而你，身为被玷污的生物，居然也会惧怕腐化。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'aurais jamais cru entendre un jour un xénos parler de corruption. Dire que des créatures aussi impures que vous craignez aussi cette ignominie contre laquelle nous luttons sans relâche... »
languages.original_text: "How strange to hear a xenos speak of corruption. We wage an implacable war against this foulness, and you, a tainted creature, fear it too."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'aurais jamais cru entendre un jour un xénos parler de corruption. Dire que des créatures aussi impures que vous craignez aussi cette ignominie contre laquelle nous luttons sans relâche... »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Es extraño escuchar a una xenos hablar de corrupción. Libramos una guerra implacable contra esa inmundicia que hasta un ser impío como tú teme».
languages.original_text: "How strange to hear a xenos speak of corruption. We wage an implacable war against this foulness, and you, a tainted creature, fear it too."

traits.locale_text: «Es extraño escuchar a una xenos hablar de corrupción. Libramos una guerra implacable contra esa inmundicia que hasta un ser impío como tú teme».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「異種族が腐敗の話をするとは妙だな。私たちはこの汚物と和解できずに戦争を続けているが、あなたのような腐った生き物もまた腐敗を恐れるとは」
languages.original_text: "How strange to hear a xenos speak of corruption. We wage an implacable war against this foulness, and you, a tainted creature, fear it too."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族が腐敗の話をするとは妙だな。私たちはこの汚物と和解できずに戦争を続けているが、あなたのような腐った生き物もまた腐敗を恐れるとは」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Wie merkwürdig, einen Xenos von der Korruption sprechen zu hören. Wir führen einen unerbittlichen Krieg gegen diese Fäulnis, und Ihr, eine verdorbene Kreatur, fürchtet sie auch."
languages.original_text: "How strange to hear a xenos speak of corruption. We wage an implacable war against this foulness, and you, a tainted creature, fear it too."

traits.locale_text: "Wie merkwürdig, einen Xenos von der Korruption sprechen zu hören. Wir führen einen unerbittlichen Krieg gegen diese Fäulnis, und Ihr, eine verdorbene Kreatur, fürchtet sie auch."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "How strange to hear a xenos speak of corruption. We wage an implacable war against this foulness, and you, a tainted creature, fear it too."

languages.text: "Bir zenonun yozlaşmadan söz ettiğini duymak tuhafıma gitti. Biz bu iğrençliğe karşı amansızca savaş veriyoruz, senin gibi lekelenmiş bir yaratık da benzer şekilde ondan korktuğunu söylüyor."
languages.original_text: "How strange to hear a xenos speak of corruption. We wage an implacable war against this foulness, and you, a tainted creature, fear it too."

traits.locale_text: "Bir zenonun yozlaşmadan söz ettiğini duymak tuhafıma gitti. Biz bu iğrençliğe karşı amansızca savaş veriyoruz, senin gibi lekelenmiş bir yaratık da benzer şekilde ondan korktuğunu söylüyor."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
